metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19378 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted btrfs filesystem image can lead to slab-out-of-bounds write access in index_rbio_pages in fs/btrfs/raid56.c.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Exploiting this vulnerability requires a crafted filesystem image to be mounted sbeattie> only affects raid5/6 on btrfs
